meanings.definition: A curve traced by a point on the circumference of a circle that rolls along a straight line.
meanings.sent1: The cycloid is a curve created by a circle moving in a straight line.
meanings.sent2: I learned about the cycloid curve in math class.
meanings.sent3: The cycloid curve went on a rollercoaster ride along the straight line.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves were as smooth and precise as a cycloid curve.
meanings.sent5: The cycloid curve looked like a snake slithering along the ground.

meanings.definition: A geometric curve generated by a point on the circumference of a circle that rolls along a straight line.
meanings.sent1: The cycloid is a curve formed by a circle rolling in a straight line.
meanings.sent2: The artist drew a beautiful cycloid in the painting.
meanings.sent3: The cycloid curve decided to take a stroll down the straight line.
meanings.sent4: His speech followed a cycloid path, moving smoothly from point to point.
meanings.sent5: The cycloid curve in the sand was washed away by the tide.
